mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.comorganization AS "comorganization", a.username AS "username", a.response AS "response", a.telephone AS "telephone", a.yjya_plan AS "yjyaPlan", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u3 ON u3.id = a.username
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO yjya_jbxx( id, comorganization, username, response, telephone, yjya_plan, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{comorganization}, #{username}, #{response}, #{telephone}, #{yjyaPlan}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE yjya_jbxx SET comorganization = #{comorganization}, username = #{username}, response = #{response}, telephone = #{telephone}, yjya_plan = #{yjyaPlan}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
